insert into t_app (type_id, user_id, privacy, name, logo, plateform, examine__status, examin_date, examin_person_name, examine_explain, publish_type, publish_date, publish_day, publish_hour, ground_status, ground_time, is_recommend, recommend_type_id, personal_recommend, license, introduction, support_language, tariff_type, download_money, download_count, download_count_add, develop_company, money_name, score, top, top_time, leve, is_must, deleted, activated, create_date, update_date) values (#{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privacy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plateform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{examinPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examineExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{publishDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groundStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommendTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personalRecommend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportLanguage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tariffType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{downloadCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{downloadCountAdd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{developCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneyName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{top,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isMust,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_app
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
privacy = #{privacy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plateform = #{plateform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examine__status = #{examineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examin_date = #{examinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
examin_person_name = #{examinPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examine_explain = #{examineExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_type = #{publishType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
publish_date = #{publishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
publish_day = #{publishDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_hour = #{publishHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ground_status = #{groundStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ground_time = #{groundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_recommend = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommend_type_id = #{recommendTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
personal_recommend = #{personalRecommend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
support_language = #{supportLanguage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tariff_type = #{tariffType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
download_money = #{downloadMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
download_count = #{downloadCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
download_count_add = #{downloadCountAdd,jdbcType=BIGINT},
develop_company = #{developCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money_name = #{moneyName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
top = #{top,jdbcType=INTEGER},
top_time = #{topTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
leve = #{leve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_must = #{isMust,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activated = #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_app set type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, privacy = #{privacy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plateform = #{plateform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, examine__status = #{examineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, examin_date = #{examinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, examin_person_name = #{examinPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, examine_explain = #{examineExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_type = #{publishType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_date = #{publishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, publish_day = #{publishDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_hour = #{publishHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ground_status = #{groundStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ground_time = #{groundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_recommend = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend_type_id = #{recommendTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personal_recommend = #{personalRecommend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, support_language = #{supportLanguage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tariff_type = #{tariffType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, download_money = #{downloadMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, download_count = #{downloadCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, download_count_add = #{downloadCountAdd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, develop_company = #{developCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money_name = #{moneyName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, top = #{top,jdbcType=INTEGER}, top_time = #{topTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leve = #{leve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_must = #{isMust,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activated = #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_app where recommend_type_id=#{recommendTypeId}

SELECT a. NAME AS appName, av.version_number as versionNum, a.app_id as appId,av.app_version_id as versionId, av.size as size,av.download_url as downloadUrl, a.introduction as introduction,a.logo as logo, av.package_name as packageName FROM t_app a, t_app_version av WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.plateform=#{platform} AND a.ground_status = 1 and now()>=publish_date and a.name like "%"#{appName}"%" limit 0,100

SELECT a. NAME AS appName, av.version_number as versionNum, a.app_id as appId,av.app_version_id as versionId, av.size as size,av.download_url as downloadUrl, a.introduction as introduction,a.logo as logo,a.download_money as downloadMoney, av.package_name as packageName FROM t_app a, t_app_version av WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND av.is_history_version = 1 AND a.ground_status = 1 and now()>=publish_date

SELECT a.privacy as power, av.support_sys as supportSys,av.package_name as packageName FROM t_app a, t_app_version av WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 and now()>=publish_date and a.app_id=#{appId}

SELECT a. NAME AS appName, av.version_number AS versionNum, a.app_id AS appId, av.app_version_id AS versionId, av.size AS size, av.download_url AS downloadUrl, a.introduction AS introduction, a.logo AS logo, a.download_money AS downloadMoney, av.package_name as packageName FROM t_app a, t_app_version av, t_app_type t WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND t.app_type_id = a.type_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND now() >= publish_date AND t.app_type_id = #{params.typeId} AND a.plateform=#{params.platform} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_app a, t_app_version av, t_app_type t WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND t.app_type_id = a.type_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND now() >= publish_date AND t.app_type_id = #{params.typeId} AND a.plateform=#{params.platform}

SELECT a. NAME AS appName, av.version_number AS versionNum, a.app_id AS appId, av.app_version_id AS versionId, av.size AS size, av.download_url AS downloadUrl, a.introduction AS introduction, a.logo AS logo, a.download_money AS downloadMoney, a.download_count as downloadCount, av.package_name as packageName FROM t_app a, t_app_version av WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND now() >= publish_date AND a.plateform=#{params.platform} ORDER BY a.download_count DESC limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_app a, t_app_version av WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND now() >= publish_date AND a.plateform=#{params.platform}

SELECT a. NAME AS appName, av.version_number AS versionNum, a.app_id AS appId, av.app_version_id AS versionId, av.size AS size, av.download_url AS downloadUrl, a.introduction AS introduction, a.logo AS logo, a.download_money AS downloadMoney, a.download_count as downloadCount, av.package_name as packageName FROM t_app a, t_app_version av WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND now() >= publish_date and a.download_count_add!=0 AND a.plateform=#{params.platform} ORDER BY a.download_count_add DESC limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_app a, t_app_version av WHERE a.app_id = av.app_id AND av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND now() >= publish_date and a.download_count_add!=0 AND a.plateform=#{params.platform}
select count(*) from t_app

select
from t_app
and plateform=#{platform}
and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{appName}), '%') and ground_status=1

SELECT a.app_id AS appId, a. NAME AS appName, av.size AS size, a.logo AS logo, a.download_count AS downloadCount, a.introduction AS introduction, av.download_url as downloadUrl, av.package_name as packageName FROM t_app a INNER JOIN t_app_version av ON av.app_id = a.app_id WHERE av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND NOW() > a.publish_date AND a.is_must = 1 and a.plateform=#{params.platform} limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_app a INNER JOIN t_app_version av ON av.app_id = a.app_id WHERE av.is_history_version = 0 AND a.ground_status = 1 AND NOW() > a.publish_date AND a.is_must = 1 and a.plateform=#{params.platform}

SELECT ua.app_id as appId, a. NAME as appName, av.version_number as versionNum, av.size as size, a.logo as logo, a.introduction as introduction, av.package_name as packageName FROM t_user_app ua INNER JOIN t_app_version av ON ua.version_id = av.app_version_id AND is_history_version = 1 and ua.user_id=#{params.userId} and ua.is_uninstall=0 INNER JOIN t_app a ON ua.app_id = a.app_id limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_user_app ua INNER JOIN t_app_version av ON ua.version_id = av.app_version_id AND is_history_version = 1 and ua.user_id=#{params.userId} and ua.is_uninstall=0 INNER JOIN t_app a ON ua.app_id = a.app_id

SELECT ua.app_id AS appId, a. NAME AS appName, av.version_number AS versionNum, av.size AS size, a.logo AS logo, a.introduction AS introduction, ua.is_uninstall AS isUninstall, av.package_name as packageName, ua.create_date as installDate FROM t_user_app ua INNER JOIN t_app_version av ON ua.version_id = av.app_version_id AND is_history_version = 0 AND ua.user_id = #{params.userId} INNER JOIN t_app a ON ua.app_id = a.app_id limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_user_app ua INNER JOIN t_app_version av ON ua.version_id = av.app_version_id AND is_history_version = 0 AND ua.user_id = #{params.userId} INNER JOIN t_app a ON ua.app_id = a.app_id
mapper.delete:
delete from t_app where app_id in
#{appId}
